name: TILTR
description:
TILTR is a modern rework of the classic board game labyrinth

Play it today and attempt to get through new obstacles while solving challenging mazes. 

PC Controls:

  • WASD - to rotate the board
  • Esc - to pause or restart levels

Helpful Tips:

  • Press and use the powerups on the bottom right. The Grow power up will allow you to roll faster and the opposite is true for the Shrink power up. They can also be useful for accessing shortcuts in the maze 
  • Remember that it is not the ball you are controlling but the rotation of the board just like the real life version
  • Small adjustments are the key to victory in a tight situation
  • If you are lost look towards the top left for the minimap to give you an overview of the maze
